ygData.messageBody:
To answer your question about mana this is the one and only answer for ya. This is
an RPG. In other words pretend it's your life. You ARE this wizard and in real
life you wouldn't be saying OH Hold Up <insert name here> I only have 10 mana left.

You just wouldn't say that you dont have a clue how much mana you have you'd just
say "wait a second I am feeling exhausted I need to regen some mana"
But I do believe it's unfair that they get to see their HP I personally think they
should take hp numbers out also. Because this game is not meant to be numerical
thus the reason why they didnt include Mana # stam # exp # or skills #
you just wouldnt know that you could only run 15 more feet youd know your tired and
have jkust a lil bit left in ya or how much exp you needed to become better youd
learn from doing it not saying oh i need to change the oil in my car 3 more times
to be a MASTER oil changer
I hope this has enlightened you Please respond back. I love to hear others
opinions.
Thanks!
Lord Thorn SoulFire
Wizard extraordinaire
The Rathe
